channel.title: Player updating, Quest tab "Players online"
channel.description:
Ok, so basically my problem with the players online, is this:
The players (Number of players online) will not update on destruction (Logout) or Login, once you login and you see the players online, you will need to logout and log back in to see the amount of players online, or obviously use the ::player command.
Does anyone know this issue?
I checked the Destruct and Initialize methods, and I could not add anything to fix it.

item.title: Player updating, Quest tab "Players online"
item.dc:creator: @projeccct projeccct
item.description:
@projeccct wrote:

Worked, thanks for the help!

Read full topic

item.title: Player updating, Quest tab "Players online"
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Try adding it in client.java

public void process() { /* Just somewhere in here so it loops through the process and automaticly updates itself */ c.getPA().sendFrame126("Players Online "+CODEHERE+", ID");

Read full topic
